original_text: While we still live in our bodies here on earth, we cry inside ourselves. Many difficult things happen to us. We do not really want to take off our old body. But we do want to put on our new body, like new clothes. When that happens, we will no longer need our old body which had to die. Instead we will have a new body that will live for ever.
korean_text: 참으로 이 장막에 있는 우리가 짐진 것 같이 탄식하는 것은 벗고자 함이 아니요 오히려 덧입고자 함이니 죽을 것이 생명에 삼킨 바 되게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: While we still live in our bodies here on earth
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 여전히 이 땅에서 우리의 몸 안에 살 때

sentences.original_text: Many difficult things happen to us
We do not really want to take off our old body
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 정말로 우리의 낡은 몸을 벗고 싶지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: But we do want to put on our new body
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리는 우리의 새로운 몸을 입고 싶습니다

sentences.original_text: we will no longer need our old body which had to die
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 더 이상 죽어야 했던 낡은 몸이 필요 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Instead we will have a new body
sentences.korean_translation: 대신 우리는 새로운 몸을 가질 것입니다
